title: Cultural Diversity and Immigration

vocab.definition: Moving from one country to live permanently in another country
Having many different types of people, cultures, or ideas
The beliefs, customs, and way of life of a group of people
Traditions and culture passed down from previous generations
A place where many different cultures blend together

teachingNotes: Discuss how people from different countries have contributed to American culture. Explore various cultural traditions, foods, and celebrations. Emphasize respect for diversity and the strength it brings to communities.
